title: The Scapegoat Loop
outcome: Oksana Lintz is blamed for the BCI failures after the data leak. She is locked out of system access, while Council factions feud over responsibility. Meanwhile, neighborhoods affected by early BCI pilot schemes face wild score fluctuations causing city riots. Finally, a data dump proves breakdowns predate Lintz, deepening suspicion across the leadership and public.

events.description: Council begins investigation into the BCI breach, with Directorate pushing to blame Oksana Lintz for the crisis.
Oksana Lintz is suspended and her system credentials are revoked. Council factions leak stories accusing her of negligence.
Residents in old pilot zones report irrational BCI score swings, leading to service denials and angry riots. Local officials plead for Council intervention.
A data leak reveals flaws in BCI code traced back to Halden's earlier emergency updates, clearing Lintz of direct fault and fueling Council mistrust.
